Bloodshot.Action: Laughs off having an AK-47 pointed at him, showing calm and a bit of humor in a tense situation.
Waves to the hostage and guards, acknowledging them in a friendly, somewhat casual manner.
Makes a sarcastic comment about the guerrillas' way of settling disputes.
Maintains composure and humor when threatened at gunpoint, indicating confidence and situational awareness.
Observes surroundings carefully, noting the hostage and guards, showing alertness and tactical awareness.
Engages with guerrillas using sarcasm and casual demeanor, demonstrating social confidence and psychological control.
Discreetly cuts the ropes tying the hostage down to help him escape.
Barks orders into comm unit, preparing for violent conflict.
Discreetly cuts the ropes tying the hostage down, enabling an escape attempt.
Barks into comm unit to prepare for loud engagement, showing tactical awareness and readiness.
Fails to prevent the hostage from panicking and running prematurely, risking mission compromise.
Kills an enemy to protect a terrified hostage and reassures the hostage by showing a video of his family, putting a gentle hand on his shoulder.
Swiftly side-steps an attack, disarms opponent, and kills him efficiently to protect the hostage.
Uses a smartphone to emotionally connect with the hostage, calming him under extreme stress.
Continues to focus on the hostage despite urgent sniper warnings to move immediately.
Engages in playful, affectionate interaction with Gina, showing physical closeness and mutual teasing.
Shows vulnerability by admitting to a minor injury and joking about losing his touch.
Inspects his own scars carefully, showing awareness of his physical condition and recent injuries.
Engages in playful, confident physical interaction demonstrating skill and control.
Mentions possibly losing his touch, showing a moment of self-doubt.
Lies in Gina's arms, shares a tender moment imagining their future child, expresses hopes and vulnerabilities about fatherhood.
Admits he cannot be both a Navy SEAL and a father, showing honesty about his limitations.
Engages in playful banter with Gina, showing a friendly and sincere connection.
Engages in playful, confident physical interaction and undercover work, showing skill and self-awareness.
Expresses doubt about balancing professional and personal life, acknowledging limitations.
Cuddles close with Gina, showing intimacy and connection.
Leaves a reassuring note for Garrison indicating care and consideration.
Engages in violent combat, using a body as a shield and fighting aggressively.
Uses Pro Two's body as a shield and takes his weapon to return fire, effectively neutralizing attackers.
Remains alert and reacts quickly to an ambush in the bathroom, despite being caught off guard.
Hides in the shower and uses surprise and physical combat to disarm and incapacitate enemies.
Accidentally slams into a stunned Aussie tourist and is vulnerable to an attack.
Engages in a fast, hand-to-hand fight using environment creatively but shows no aggression toward bystanders.
Uses shower curtain to deflect blows and disorient opponent during hand-to-hand combat.
Quickly sidesteps opponent's lunge causing them to crash through a window, buying time to escape.
Accidentally slams into a stunned bystander while fleeing, revealing lack of situational awareness.
Collapses after being stabbed with an auto injector and unable to resist or escape.
Recovers color and confidence quickly after being captured and interrogated.
Does not intervene to protect Gina, allows her to be tortured and killed.
Expresses intense rage and grief after Gina's death, showing emotional depth and attachment.
Maintains composure and tries to reason with Aussie under extreme pressure, attempting to protect Gina by convincing Aussie he doesn't have the intel.
Fails to prevent Gina's murder despite efforts to de-escalate the situation and protect her.
Thrashes violently and panics due to confusion and loss of identity.
Remains motionless and unconscious after the electrical charge, then slowly regains consciousness.
Tries to move but cannot; limbs locked in place.
Expresses confusion and panic due to memory loss and inability to identify himself.
Expresses confusion and frustration about his lost memories, thrashing violently and overwhelmed by emotions.
Responds to Dr. Harting with dry humor ('Hell of a hangover') despite his dire situation.
Shows shock and vulnerability upon learning he was dead and brought back to life.
Wakes up disoriented and confused, thrashing violently and overwhelmed by emotions.
Sits up in the recovery room and assesses his physical condition despite pain and confusion.
Engages in conversation with Dr. Harting, showing awareness and some wit despite memory loss.
Expresses shock and confusion about his own identity and condition.
Remains calm and processes the shocking information about being an experiment and having nanites in his blood.
Demonstrates retained basic cognitive skills such as walking, talking, and simple math despite memory loss.
Questions and tries to understand his condition and the extent of his abilities.
Expresses confusion and shock about his lost memories.
Engages cooperatively with Harting, showing openness to new challenges and bonding potential.
Focuses intensely on physical testing and self-improvement without showing emotional connection or empathy in this scene.
Strains muscles to power a giant water wheel under resistance, pushing physical limits to exceed ten MPH.
Asks insightful questions about his identity and capabilities, showing engagement and understanding.
Reflects on having loved people and cared about them, showing a hint of emotional connection.
Follows Harting on a tour without resistance, showing openness to new ideas and hope for others.
Observes and processes the advanced technology and capabilities around him, including a vet sprinting faster than Usain Bolt, showing awareness and engagement.
Reflects on his past life and relationships, showing emotional depth but some uncertainty about his identity and purpose.
Follows Harting on a tour without questioning or challenging the risks involved in the process, showing some passivity or lack of assertiveness.
Jokes about never having to exfoliate again after learning about nanites repairing his body.
Shows determination and perseverance by pushing himself to break a fitness record despite physical strain.
Endures intense physical training, pushing himself to near breaking point and surpassing previous records.
Reacts with humor and amazement to the nanites repairing his body, showing awareness and engagement with his enhanced abilities.
Nearly causes an accident by losing control of the water wheel at peak speed.
Bloodshot smiles after breaking the turbine, showing a brief moment of lightness.
Bloodshot threatens to find and end the person who killed his wife, showing intense anger and vengefulness.
Bloodshot is overwhelmed by pain and sensory overload, but does not lash out indiscriminately, showing some restraint.
Bloodshot slams Harting against the wall in a moment of rage.
Breaks the turbine, causing it to crack and collapse.
Smiles after breaking the turbine, showing a lack of concern for the failure.
Responds with aggression and physical violence by slamming Harting against the wall.
Shows signs of sensory overload and intense pain, losing composure and control.
Attempts to communicate and question Harting despite distress.
Stops the door from closing to escape, showing quick thinking and urgency to survive.
Lunges for a fire extinguisher to create a diversion, despite being wounded and desperate.
Admits 'Didn't save her... my fault...' showing self-blame and emotional vulnerability.
Stops the door from closing to escape the room despite being pursued.
Doubles back to avoid security in SWAT gear, showing tactical awareness.
Lunges for a fire extinguisher and breaks the glass to use as a weapon or distraction.
Throws the extinguisher but misses the guards, though hits the sprinkler head causing a smoke screen.
Runs with heart pounding, legs failing, described as a wounded animal who doesn’t know where he’s going.
Despite being attacked and blinded by sarin gas, fights back by using his taser baton to incapacitate So Long and attempts to escape.
Uses a taser baton to deliver a surprise attack on So Long, causing him to drop Bloodshot and enabling escape attempt.
Tries to crawl away and escape despite being slammed against the wall and blinded by sarin gas.
Fails to avoid the sarin gas explosion and is blinded, showing vulnerability to chemical attack.
Ultimately caught and tranquilized by a sniper’s dart despite efforts to escape.
Pleading with Harting to find the person who hurt Gina, showing emotional vulnerability and concern for others.
Expresses intense anger and desire for revenge against the man who shot Gina.
Remembers key details about the mission and the attacker despite memory loss.
Is restrained and unable to act on his knowledge immediately.
Expresses urgency and determination to find the attacker.
Appears emotionally affected and distracted by guilt over letting Gina die.
Expresses deep love and grief for his wife Gina, showing capacity for attachment and sincere emotion.
Driven by anger and desire for revenge, stating he cannot move on until his enemy is dead.
Engages in a sincere conversation with Harting, showing vulnerability by asking if he has ever lost someone important.
Focuses solely on revenge and killing his target, showing little tolerance or forgiveness.
Determines to find and kill the man responsible for Gina's death, showing focused resolve.
Considers Harting's advice about training and using resources, showing openness to strategy and preparation.
Acts driven by anger and personal loss, which clouds his judgment and may impair clear thinking.
Demands that after he kills his target, the target stays dead, showing clear, decisive intent.
Falls to his knees when restraints retract, indicating a moment of vulnerability or weakness.
Responds to Tibbs's apology for shooting him with a lighthearted comment, 'Just glad you missed my face.'
Questions the potential pain of the process, showing vulnerability and openness.
Questions the need to unlearn survival instincts, showing critical thinking about his new condition.
Engages with Harting about the painful nature of his transformation, indicating awareness and caution.
Shows readiness to face the Chainsaw team and the challenges ahead without hesitation.
Engages in light teasing with So Long, calling out his knowledge of Disney princesses.
Nails So Long with a stun baton during his failed escape.
Nails So Long with a stun baton during his failed escape.
Failed escape attempt.
Takes in the Chainsaw crew as his new 'family' and acknowledges them as 'wounded warriors.'
Engages in training with Harting, showing focus and willingness to improve.
Takes in the Chainsaw crew and understands their situation as 'wounded warriors' turned 'enhanced' and 'given purpose.'
Engages in a sparring exercise with Harting, advancing quickly and showing agility and confidence.
Acknowledges Harting's pun, showing awareness and quick wit.
Gets sliced in the leg by Harting during the sparring exercise.
KP winks at Bloodshot before attacking him in the dark, and Bloodshot responds without hostility or complaint.
Breaks plastic cuffs underwater and fights to survive despite being betrayed and shot at by Tibbs.
Tries to call a time out after being stabbed, but fails to prevent further injury.
Attempts to follow instructions to reach the door behind KP despite being unarmed and in darkness.
Struggles to get his bearings in the dark and is swept down by KP.
Breaks plastic cuffs underwater and swims for the surface despite hands bound and panic setting in.
Panics when unable to break the surface without risking a sniper headshot.
Reluctantly follows So Long's harsh training by holding a scalding hot rock despite obvious pain and fear.
Expresses panic and fear of dying openly, showing vulnerability.
Sarcastically insults Harting by calling him a terrible doctor despite the life-threatening situation.
Reluctantly holds a scalding hot rock but immediately drops it, showing hesitation and lack of control.
Falls hard and panics after being seriously injured, expressing fear of dying.
Despite injury and panic, survives a normally fatal wound due to nanites, indicating resilience beyond normal human limits.
Wakes up in recovery and is immediately prompted to try the test again, implying persistence and willingness to continue training.
Complains about inability to see during a test but is advised to fix the problem himself, suggesting a need to take initiative and problem-solve.
Fights KP with readiness and determination, showing resilience despite being blinded and knocked down.
Focuses on survival and self-repair, showing personal endurance but no direct interaction with others.
Adjusts his vision to see in low visibility by activating enhanced eye capabilities, enabling him to detect his opponent and surroundings.
Uses advanced combat analytics and targeting reticule technology to anticipate and counter KP's moves, gaining the upper hand in the fight.
Fails to anticipate or prevent being blinded by a chemical attack, resulting in a fall to the floor.
Recovers quickly from injury and physiological trauma, demonstrating resilience and self-healing ability.
Begins to panic underwater, showing a lapse in control and survival instincts interfering with his focus.
Demonstrates awareness of his regenerative powers by testing and observing rapid healing of burned flesh.
Is caught off guard by So Long approaching with a blowtorch, indicating a momentary lapse in situational awareness.
Raises his arms triumphantly after disarming KP, makes a snarky comment to lighten the mood.
Looks bewildered at KP after she offers advice and help.
Catches KP's staff mid-swing despite being blinded and disarms her with two swift twists.
Uses internal adaptation to regain hearing despite chemical toxins blinding him.
Collapses immediately after a kick to the groin, showing vulnerability to weak spots.
Grimaces and grits teeth while sustaining multiple cuts but uses self-healing to recover and continues fighting.
Looks bewildered when KP explains controlling blood flow and muscle groups, indicating some lack of understanding.
Claps hands with Harting, congratulating him despite the danger.
Shows hesitation and doubt about stepping off the ledge to save himself.
Does not retaliate immediately after being stabbed by Harting, indicating restraint.
Catches a blade with his hands despite being injured, then wrenches the sword away from Harting, showing physical skill and resilience.
Is caught off guard and stabbed by Harting after a congratulatory handshake, showing a momentary lapse in caution.
Recognizes the significance of the red pulse alert from his nanites and contemplates the need to act despite doubt, showing awareness and internal conflict.
Fails to immediately act on the life-saving leap of faith suggested by Harting, hesitating due to mental doubt.
Makes a deal with Harting to survive and keep his promise, showing commitment and trust.
Shares a casual, friendly exchange with KP, including humor and openness about his preferences.
Remembers Gina fondly and reflects on her smile, showing emotional connection and sincerity.
Survives a severe gut wound and negotiates a deal to continue his mission.
Carefully samples various snacks to determine his preferences, showing methodical behavior.
Shows uncertainty and confusion about his own past and identity.
Accepts a personal gift from KP discreetly, showing trust and appreciation.
Reacts emotionally to photos of Gina, showing vulnerability and attachment.
Carefully examines the box of personal effects, powers up a dead iPod using a charger found in the box, and accesses music and photos to jog his memory.
Shows emotional vulnerability and distraction when confronted with memories, trembling and slumping shoulders, indicating momentary loss of composure.
Maintains a silent, intense vigil for hours, focused on finding the man who shot Gina.
Shows no reaction to Tibbs snapping fingers or Harting's warning about weird lapses, indicating emotional detachment.
Maintains intense focus for hours without blinking or moving while scanning billions of images to find a target.
Does not respond to others' attempts to get his attention, indicating deep concentration and control.
Sweats and twitches after prolonged focus, showing physical limits but still manages to identify the target.
Takes a deep breath before a dangerous mission, showing vulnerability.
Shares a look with KP, indicating a silent mutual concern.
Prepares to go on a solo mission despite risks, showing determination but also isolation.
Barrels into the room surprising the men, showing decisiveness and urgency.
Checks the sights and thumbs the safety on a Desert Eagle, demonstrating familiarity and skill with weapons.
Acknowledges the need to get creative with travel due to metal detectors, showing situational awareness and problem-solving.
Takes a deep breath and shows possible nervousness before mission, indicating some self-doubt or anxiety.
Confidently states 'I'll be fine... survived the freakshow, didn’t I?,' showing resilience and confidence.
Jokes about his pale skin and shows openness to change after Harting's advice.
Expresses appreciation to Harting for letting him undertake the mission, showing sincerity and respect.
Responds to So Long's taunt with a sharp insult, showing hostility rather than friendliness.
Intends to return the favor by killing the Axe clown who put a bullet in his brain, showing determination and confidence.
Holds his ground when So Long is on his feet, demonstrating steadiness and control.
Notices his pale skin and considers changing it, then successfully transforms his complexion to a healthy tone, showing adaptability and control over his body.
Expresses appreciation for being allowed to undertake a dangerous mission rather than escaping, indicating responsibility and commitment.
Responds to Harting’s warning about being a dead man if he doesn’t return with a calm acceptance and promise to come back, showing confidence and resolve.
Reflects on being given a second chance to make things right.
Takes a bite of a stranger's homemade cookies found in checked luggage.
Successfully uses advanced disguise and infiltration by assuming the identity of an Asian baggage handler to covertly board a plane.
Efficiently selects appropriate clothing and prepares a briefcase for his mission while maintaining focus and composure.
Accesses and multitasks through complex holographic data systems seamlessly while eating a cookie, showing mental agility and multitasking ability.
Uses company internet server as personal jukebox, blasting Judas Priest music loudly.
Quietly and efficiently accesses employee records and satellite photos to gather intelligence without alerting others.
Speaks in Russian during luggage inspection, indicating adaptability and effort to blend in.
Accesses multiple data sources simultaneously using mental commands, multitasking with holographic windows to gather intelligence on a target location and personnel.
Uses employee income return forms to trace a Russian shell company and investigates the building’s history and night shift staffing to plan an infiltration.
Uses the internet server link as a personal jukebox, blasting Judas Priest music that distracts or annoys his own team monitoring him.
Physically infiltrates a secure location by riding a luggage conveyor belt at an airport, blending in with baggage handlers and speaking Russian to avoid suspicion.
Gives a cookie to the luggage handler after complimenting him.
Attempts to strangle Alexi Krieger with a phone cord, showing no hesitation to use violence.
Engages in a violent struggle with Krieger, showing aggression and lack of tolerance.
Handles fragile box carefully and successfully deceives baggage handler.
Attempts to strangle Krieger but underestimates his opponent, allowing Krieger to counterattack effectively and stab him.
Cuts off his own finger to gain Krieger's trust and get information.
Pushes his impaled hand further down the knife to overpower Krieger.
Pushes his impaled hand further down the knife and uses his healing ability to grip and pull the weapon from Krieger's hand.
Headbutts Krieger immediately after disarming him, showing quick and decisive action.
Improvises restraints using extension cords and a curling iron when no rope or tape is available.
Engages Krieger in interrogation by leveraging knowledge about Martin Axe and Krieger's background.
Cuts off his own finger to provide a blood sample, demonstrating extreme resolve and willingness to endure pain to achieve his goal.
Scratches Viktor’s head before leaving.
Cuts off his own finger to prove determination.
Drinks his own blood to demonstrate sincerity and commitment.
Cuts off his own finger to prove seriousness and uses nanites to reattach it, demonstrating pain tolerance and advanced self-healing.
Presses Krieger for information and quickly deduces the location of the bomb and the difficulty of accessing it.
Drinks his own blood to demonstrate commitment and intimidate Krieger, showing psychological insight and confidence.
Threatens to come back for a blood sample if lied to, showing strategic thinking and caution.
Moves quickly and uses voice over IP to communicate while tracking the target, showing tactical awareness and use of technology.
Walks up to guarded private property and kills two armed guards without hesitation.
Identifies point of entry quickly and accurately before the team requests it.
Approaches a heavily guarded front gate despite high chances of detection, showing confidence and boldness.
Disarms one guard swiftly and causes the other to panic, resulting in both guards being shot, demonstrating combat skill and decisiveness.
Shoots the mercenary commander and watchman without hesitation to escape captivity.
Unzips body bag and surprises guards by shooting them both with precise double taps.
Quickly arms himself with an assault rifle and moves stealthily down the freighter.
Locates and rips out the power line in the utility room, disabling power.
Relentlessly fights multiple enemies despite severe injury, refusing to give up.
Rips out the power line to cut power, using tactical sabotage.
Uses nanite-induced infrared filter to track enemies in the dark.
Strikes quickly and takes down multiple enemies before they react.
Focuses on primary target Axe despite multiple enemies around.
Gets shot down multiple times but continues to fight and kills remaining enemies.
Bloodshot is overwhelmed by numbers and ultimately shot down.
Carries a photo of his murdered wife to remind Axe of her, showing personal attachment and motivation.
Shoots Axe in the back, paralyzing him, and shows primal rage and sneering.
Confronts Axe with accusations about murdering his wife, indicating a personal and emotional response.
Appears suddenly next to Axe, demonstrating stealth and timing.
Shoots Axe in the back, paralyzing him effectively.
Carries a photo of Gina on his iPod, using it to psychologically unsettle Axe.
Engages Axe with a large Desert Eagle confidently, showing no hesitation.
Shows primal rage and sneering, which could cloud judgment.
Leaps from a high railing despite injury, endures pain, and uses nanites to heal and keep running.
Responds quickly to Harting’s warning about the EMP and runs at high speed over rooftops to escape danger.
Asks a clarifying question about the EMP’s effects, showing situational awareness.
Despite his efforts, suffers a system failure when the EMP hits, causing him to double over in pain and lose function.
Smiles upon finding a note from Gina, showing appreciation for her gesture.
Leaves a friendly, apologetic voicemail to reconnect and share personal thoughts.
Laughs to himself while reflecting on a dream, indicating openness and a light-hearted moment.
Attempts to reboot nanites and heal despite system failure.
Falls unconscious and unable to heal, showing vulnerability to unknown failure.
Wakes up alone, notices absence of scar, and reflects on strange circumstances.
Considers leaving field work for instructor role, showing self-awareness and planning.
Lost in thought and scrubbing chest repeatedly, indicating confusion and uncertainty.
Tells the old guy to go to his room and lock the door, showing concern for the old guy's safety despite being in a hostile situation.
Smiles with tears welling up upon seeing Gina alive, showing deep emotional connection and vulnerability.
Throws a Pro off the balcony and fights aggressively to find his wife, showing violent and hostile behavior.
Takes out the first Pro quickly and counters the second Pro's attack with ease, pinning him against the balcony railing.
Throws the Pro off the balcony decisively after interrogation attempt.
Commands the old guy to go to his room and lock the door, showing control of the situation.
Fails to anticipate the old guy's attack with an auto-injector, resulting in being stabbed in the back and collapsing.
Remembers everything suddenly, indicating regained mental clarity and situational awareness.
Is confused and disoriented when confronted by the old guy and his men, showing vulnerability in the situation.
Tries to console Gina while she sobs, apologizes sincerely.
Shows emotional vulnerability by crying and expressing sorrow.
Begins to accept death to protect or spare others from further pain.
Calls Krieger a 'Russian bastard' and resists electrocution.
Tries to console Gina despite emotional overwhelm and soul-crushing situation.
Appears defeated and resigned, telling captors to kill him.
Recognizes he is in Krieger’s work room and assesses his situation despite grogginess and restraints.
Attempts to pull free and resist electrocution despite being restrained and weakened.
Shows some sarcasm and defiance toward Krieger even while being tortured.
Does not attack Krieger after regaining consciousness despite pain and disorientation.
Glares silently at Krieger without responding to questions.
Endures extreme pain and multiple shocks without losing consciousness or giving up.
Breaks free and regains control after being incapacitated.
Repositions something between his teeth despite severe pain, indicating presence of mind.
Shows confusion about his surroundings and situation, asking how he got there.
Mentally processes complex and confusing visions about his wife and various men, showing some cognitive engagement.
Expresses concern about possibly being wrong in his vendetta and decides he has to find out the truth.
Shows no reaction to Krieger's loss of his iPod due to EMP, Krieger doesn’t notice Bloodshot’s look of loss.
Thanks Krieger sincerely and promises to get him a blood sample, showing appreciation and trust.
Uses sarcasm when confronted by patrolmen, indicating a guarded or distant demeanor.
Acknowledges he is on his own but remains calm and plans to get creative with his resources.
Keeps composure when approached by armed patrolmen, obeys commands without panic, and positions himself strategically near the train.
Sarcastically comments on the situation, indicating awareness and mental sharpness despite danger.
Admits uncertainty about who killed his wife and shares his doubts with Harting.
Physically endures severe pain silently and focuses on solving the problem alone.
Refuses to return immediately despite Harting's warnings, insisting on figuring things out first.
Physically snaps his dislocated arm back into place despite the pain and continues moving forward.
Realizes he is out of EMP range and uses this to regain communication and gather intelligence.
Questions initial assumptions about who killed his wife based on new information and memory recall.
Refuses to return immediately despite warnings about his nanites malfunctioning and potential risk to his life.
Says 'Right now, I don’t trust anyone.'
Accesses internal server and navigates complex organizational chart to uncover deeper layers of the enemy's structure.
Expresses distrust openly but proceeds with calculated actions to gather intelligence.
Mentally overlays org chart on real world, showing advanced cognitive processing and situational awareness.
Keeps moving on the train, head down, not making eye contact with anyone after being recognized on TV.
Sits down across from the British commuter in business class despite being questioned and challenged.
Moves inconspicuously through the train, avoiding eye contact despite being on live news.
Sits confidently in business class despite not having a ticket, challenges the British commuter's authority calmly.
Puts a hand on the British commuter's shoulder and forcibly sits him back down to borrow his laptop.
Tries to reassure the British commuter in a friendly tone that watching porn on the train is safe.
Forcibly sits the British commuter back down to borrow his laptop, demonstrating assertiveness and control.
Successfully bypasses the password protection by cycling through numbers until the laptop unlocks.
Maintains a friendly demeanor despite provoking the commuter, showing social skill and confidence.
Rolls his eyes and taps impatiently at the tray-table while waiting for search results, indicating some frustration but continuing the task.
Experiences shock and doubt about his own past after seeing search results, revealing vulnerability and uncertainty.
Politely signals the train officer and thanks him despite the stuck door.
Responds to Harting's calls with a calm, measured message asking for time and requesting a message be left.
Identifies a relevant lead on a Facebook personal page and processes location information quickly.
Notices the stuck door and directs the train officer efficiently to the other door, facilitating smooth exit.
Uses real-time translation to understand the German departures board and interprets the delay information.
Responds to repeated calls from Harting with a calm, measured message indicating he needs time to figure things out, avoiding panic or rash decisions.
Grins after unlocking and starting the Tesla, showing a moment of lightheartedness.
Successfully uses an ATM in test mode to withdraw cash without issue.
Selects and acquires new clothes that fit his style and needs.
Effortlessly accesses and operates a high-tech Tesla vehicle, unlocking doors with a snap and driving at high speed.
Lies unconscious on a roof after an EMP burst, implied to be used as a weapon by Kozol without regard for collateral damage or oversight.
Successfully evades capture and operates covertly across multiple countries, killing high-value targets despite heavy security.
Is described as a 'killing machine' and a 'game-changer' by high-level officials, indicating high effectiveness in his missions.
Is being used for unauthorized 'joy rides' and 'field testing' by Kozol, leading to loss of control over him.
Appears to be out of control or lost to his handlers, causing serious political and operational risks.
Acknowledges and appreciates help from an ally, warning them about danger.
Pauses and shows hesitation before approaching a place tied to personal memories, gently caressing the truck.
Uses a prepaid phone to communicate cautiously and strategically.
Pauses and hesitates at the call box, showing a momentary loss of courage.
Follows a sound to investigate the nearby area instead of rushing in blindly.
Touches the pickup truck cautiously, showing emotional vulnerability and hesitation.
Holds his trembling fist before knocking, showing nervousness and vulnerability about seeing his wife again.
Attempts to break tension with a light comment despite deep sorrow, showing a desire to connect and ease emotional pain.
Embraces Gina at the threshold, showing openness to emotional connection and reconciliation.
Holds up a fist to knock but notices his hand trembling, showing nervousness and emotional vulnerability before seeing his wife.
Manages to speak despite overwhelming shock and emotion, attempting to break tension with a light comment.
Sits down and tries to explain confusing memories and events to Gina, showing effort to communicate clearly despite emotional difficulty.
Expresses deep desire to reconnect with Gina and rebuild their life together despite his memory loss and confusion.
Shows vulnerability and confusion about his past and relationship, indicating sincerity and emotional openness.
Focuses on shared memories and personal details (like liking tequila) to connect with Gina.
Struggles to remember key personal memories and details about his own life and relationships.
Acknowledges his confusion and attempts to find clarity by reconnecting with Gina, showing some self-awareness.
Expresses a desire to move on and start a new life, indicating hope but also possible naivety about his situation.
Grabs a shell-shocked Gina and pulls her to safety, instructs her to get into the bathroom for protection.
Dazes Tibbs and steals his rifle during the assault.
Steps aside to avoid Tibbs' gunfire, avoiding unnecessary harm.
Returns fire at Tibbs but clarifies he was not aiming to kill.
Uses nanites in his inner ear to detect faint sounds, showing heightened sensory awareness.
Immediately reacts to the threat by getting Gina to safety and engaging attackers.
Dazes Tibbs and steals his rifle quickly during the assault.
Fires suppressive bursts to cover movement into the bedroom.
In a firefight, uses thermographic imagery to locate and target Tibbs through the wall.
Steps aside just as Tibbs fires, avoiding getting hit.
Does not aim to kill Tibbs, indicating controlled use of force.
Asks Gina if she still trusts him before risking a dangerous jump out the window with her, showing concern for her feelings and safety.
Cradles Gina protectively during the fall, prioritizing her safety over his own.
Reassures Gina after the fall despite his own injuries, trying to calm her fears.
Psychs himself up to jump out the window with Gina despite the danger.
Successfully protects Gina during a dangerous fall and survives severe injuries.
Quickly resets his own broken ribs and joints after the fall.
Uses a calculated risk to escape through the window rather than waiting passively.
Admits fault for putting Gina in danger and offers to deal with the threat himself to protect her.
Promises Gina he will come back for her, showing commitment and sincerity.
Expresses gratitude after reconnecting emotionally with Gina, acknowledging their real love.
Slaps his dislocated fingers back into place and says 'All good.'
Acknowledges fault for tracking Gina down and offers to handle the threat himself.
Takes control of the situation by driving and promising to come back for Gina despite danger.
Runs directly at a pursuing SUV, takes multiple bullets, and vaults through the vehicle.
Despite severe injuries and being run down multiple times, Bloodshot gets back up and continues to fight.
Shows resilience and determination but no direct interaction indicating friendliness or trustworthiness in this excerpt.
Takes multiple bullets and a hit from an SUV but keeps running and gets back up repeatedly, even shaking a broken arm back into place.
Despite severe injuries and being shot multiple times at close range, he continues to resist and does not give up immediately.
Eventually falls and is unable to get up after being shot multiple times and run down again, showing limits to his endurance.
His eyes drift in and out of focus; he stops breathing and appears dead.
Despite being dead, his body is successfully resurrected through advanced technology, indicating his resilience and the capability of his enhancements.
Forces a smile and takes Gina's hand, showing a moment of connection despite inner turmoil.
Lost in thought, distracted during a personal moment, indicating emotional distance.
No direct action or statement in this excerpt showing warmth or coldness.
Remains lost in thought and distracted during a conversation with Gina, showing internal conflict and lack of focus.
Accepts the plan involving memory implants and assassination without apparent resistance, indicating compliance but possibly lack of control or initiative.
Believes he was avenging Gina's death, motivated by love for her.
Described as a capable soldier, proficient in close quarters combat, small arms, and heavy ordinance.
Used his skills to kill with astonishing success, motivated by love.
Looks at Gina with a breaking heart, showing emotional pain and regret.
Allows Gina to be dragged in bound and gagged, seemingly powerless or resigned.
Tells Harada to shoot Gina, seemingly resigned to the situation and not protecting her.
Maintains composure and uses psychological tactics by allowing Harada to believe he is willing to sacrifice Gina, showing strategic thinking and emotional control.
Appears groggy and confused initially, indicating some mental disorientation.
Recognizes the situation as unreal and plays along to gain advantage, demonstrating situational awareness and adaptability.
Thrashes violently and expresses frustration at not knowing his own identity.
Touches his scar and tries to remember where he got it, showing vulnerability.
Responds groggily and with dry humor about having a hangover.
Wakes up suddenly in sensory deprivation tank, immediately aware of his location and surroundings.
Thrashes violently and demands answers when he does not remember who he is.
Sits up suddenly in recovery room and tries to get his bearings despite grogginess.
Touches the scar on his chest, attempting to recall its origin.
Lunges aggressively at Harting, causing a confrontation and triggering emergency protocols.
Breaks glass to let fresh air in, preventing harm to himself and others from the gas.
Focuses on locating Gina via security cameras, showing concern for her.
Lunges at Harting quickly and aggressively, showing decisiveness and physical capability.
Despite losing consciousness from the gas, uses his last strength to shatter the glass and let air in, demonstrating resilience and problem-solving under pressure.
Uses nanites to access security camera feeds and identify persons of interest, showing technical skill and situational awareness.
Breaks a light and crosses wires to cause blackout, enabling his escape, indicating tactical thinking and resourcefulness.
Fails to catch Harting before he escapes the initial confrontation, showing a momentary lapse in immediate physical dominance.
Strikes first against heavily armed soldiers to protect himself and teammates, showing tactical decisiveness.
Unintentionally causes friendly fire casualties due to his aggressive attack.
Shows determination and resilience by walking through fire while injured.
Speaks quietly, 'Tell me you're here,' indicating a desire for connection or reassurance.
Strikes from above, attacking a heavily armed security team while they are clustered and unable to fire effectively.
Uses a grenade to breach the infusion lab doors, showing tactical use of explosives to gain entry.
Crouches behind a ballistic shield for cover but is blown back by his own grenade explosion, indicating a misjudgment of the blast radius.
Walks through a wall of flames on fire, relying on nanites to heal and extinguish the fire, demonstrating resilience and confidence in his abilities.
Pauses to communicate and confirm ally presence despite urgent circumstances, showing situational awareness and communication skills.
Tells KP 'You don’t have to do this...' showing an attempt to appeal to KP's conscience and avoid violence.
Accuses KP of murdering innocents and references his wife, showing emotional openness and moral concern.
Tries to crawl away from violence rather than fight back aggressively.
Does not retaliate aggressively despite being attacked repeatedly.
Pushes So Long into the pool to gain advantage in fight.
Flips the bird at So Long after his death.
Helps KP escape the fire despite her being hurt.
Reassures KP and shows understanding about their shared manipulation.
PUSHES So Long into the pool to exploit his inability to swim with the exoskeleton, showing tactical thinking under pressure.
Wrestles underwater and manages to survive while So Long drowns, demonstrating physical skill and resilience.
Breaks free and returns to the surface, showing situational awareness and survival instinct.
Helps KP escape despite her injuries, showing leadership and concern for allies.
Tells KP to trust him about the crazy Russian, indicating confidence and control of the situation.
Enters Gina's cell to rescue her despite his uncertain identity and altered state.
Acknowledges Gina's fear and confusion, shows concern by saying 'You shouldn't even be here. Let’s fix that.'
Pauses at the elevator threshold after getting Gina inside, indicating hesitation or internal conflict.
Kicks open the stairwell door and leads KP inside confidently despite danger.
Acknowledges the manipulation tactic involving KP's wife but remains resolute it won't work.
Steps into Gina's cell forcefully to rescue her, showing decisiveness and strength.
Pauses at the elevator threshold after getting Gina inside, showing hesitation.
Pauses at the elevator threshold, offers Gina a ride downstairs, indicating concern for her safety.
Admits he cannot remember their wedding night, showing vulnerability and honesty.
Pulls Gina close and kisses her before leaving, expressing love despite the danger.
Says goodbye indirectly, preparing Gina for possible loss, showing emotional difficulty but sincerity.
Focuses on stopping Harting despite personal risk, prioritizing greater good over personal happiness.
Pauses at the elevator threshold, showing hesitation but prioritizing Gina's safety by arranging a ride for her and deciding to face the threat alone.
Acknowledges his memory loss and the danger he faces, yet makes a clear, strategic decision to stop Harting despite the personal cost.
Acts on Gina's encouragement and his own resolve to confront the enemy, demonstrating determination and focus under pressure.
Kicks open the server room door decisively, showing assertiveness and readiness to engage the threat.
Is ambushed and caught in a choke-hold by Harting, struggling to break free but initially failing.
Breaks his own arm to grab Harting's head and confront him physically.
Steps back and attempts to throw the device away to prevent harm.
Reaches out for Harting when incapacitated, showing vulnerability or seeking connection.
Breaks his own arm to gain leverage and grab Harting's head, then kicks Harting back.
Confidently dismisses the threat of the short sword, stating it can't stop him.
Attempts to neutralize the device by grabbing it and throwing it out the door.
Fails to anticipate or counter the electromagnetic pulse device that disables his nanites and powers him down.
Unable to move or defend himself after being disabled, allowing Harting to approach and stab him.
In his dying breaths, uses his last strength to sever the power cable, enabling his own reboot and survival.
Throws Harting’s sword at him but states he wasn’t aiming for Harting, implying intent to avoid direct harm.
Despite being mortally wounded and bleeding out, uses his last strength to sever the power cable, triggering a reboot sequence that revives him.
Immediately upon rebooting, acts decisively by attacking Harting and neutralizing the pilot, demonstrating tactical awareness and combat skill.
Absorbs a powerful punch from Harting's cyber-arm without apparent lasting damage, showing resilience and possibly enhanced physical competence.
Refuses Harting's offer to restore his memories and life, indicating a letting go of past attachments.
Uses Harting's own words to taunt him before throwing both off the roof, showing ruthlessness and lack of mercy.
Uses nanite-controlled plasma to short-circuit Harting's cyber-arm, effectively disabling his opponent's advantage.
Relentlessly assaults Harting, pushing him to the edge and gaining the upper hand in combat.
Rejects the offer to regain his memories and past life, showing mental clarity and focus on his current mission.
Throws himself and Harting off a burning rooftop, using the fall strategically to incapacitate his enemy.
Allows KP to call him by his first name, 'Ray', signaling some openness and informality.
Greets KP warmly: 'Good to see you.'
Expresses concern about Gina's safety and well-being.
Responds sarcastically to Krieger's vague answer about his condition ('Great, just great. Love specific answers.'), showing impatience.
Slowly gets out of bed, assesses surroundings, asks about permanence of his condition and status of allies/enemies.
Responds with sarcasm to uncertain answers but continues to gather information calmly.
Nods and blinks after hearing about threats, showing awareness and readiness.
Expresses doubt about survival but remains focused on next steps.
Does not immediately rush to return to wife despite desire, indicating strategic patience.
Throws himself through a skylight to confront Kozol, surprising him but not immediately resorting to lethal force.
Points a gun at Kozol but does not shoot immediately, engages in conversation instead.
Comments to Kozol that he could have fought back, with a hint of dry humor.
Infiltrates Kozol's penthouse by being thrown through the skylight disguised as a security officer, surprising Kozol and gaining the upper hand.
Cracks his neck back into place quickly after rising, showing physical readiness and resilience.
Points a larger handgun at Kozol, forcing him to surrender without a fight.
Engages Kozol in verbal exchange, showing confidence and control of the situation.
Misses the initial presence of Kozol’s guard’s body and the sounds on the roof, indicating a momentary lapse in situational awareness.
Is gobsmacked and unable to comprehend the power displayed by Harada.
